p: Most of the literature on Tualang, Gelam, and Kelulut honeys focused on their anti-cancer properties in many models and various mechanisms. Studies involved all sets of subjects, from animal to cell culture and human studies. A total of 18 studies were found: five animal studies, 11 in vitro studies and two human studies. A summary of the anti-cancer properties for Tualang, Gelam, and Kelulut honey is provided in Table 4, while their anti-cancer pathway is illustrated in Figure 3.
